comment.author: 49344711@N00
comment._content: My Dad was a stock and station agent. When he took me along to work, he would spend a lot of time putting sheep through yards like this. Thanks for the image.

comment._content: I am rather dubious that it is circular quay

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: So that is different to No.4 Ferry wharf then.    I am still dubious why they would load sheep at Circular Quay.    It's rather difficult to get them there.
